name: ZelnickMedia
overview: ZelnickMedia is a partnership of experienced media executives and investors. The firm manages and owns interests in an array of media enterprises, including video games and interactive entertainment, market research, recorded music, business information, tradeshows, television advertising and media-related business services enterprises in the U.S., Europe, Asia and Australia. Current portfolio companies include Take-Two Interactive Software, Columbia Music Entertainment, ITN Networks, Arkadium and Naylor Inc. The partnership is currently investing from ZM Capital, its media-focused private equity fund.

funding_round.source_description: Zelnick Buys Gossip Girl Creator Alloy For $126.5 Million
